name: Future Help Designs
tagline: Designing the Future of Mobile Apps
description:
At Future Help Designs we make apps. As a member of the Apple Consultants Network, we are able to provide you with the knowledge to help you make the right decision with your mobile technology investment.  Let us help you get mobile. Our mobile app software design and development services focus on Apple and Android mobile smartphones and devices (iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Android Smart Phones & Tablets). We can help you create an app for your business, corporation, or enterprise.
FHD Team & Talents: The FHD team has over 100 years of combined software development and design experience. Our mobile developer team operates in an Agile Development model to maintain flexibility on your smartphone application projects. Our iOS and Android expertise includes, mobile user experience (UX) design, globalization, networking and security, data management and training.  We provide a broad range corporate structure which provides high end, high polish solutions to our clients. Products & Services: Future Help Designs has created products for the education, health and wellness, and enterprise business verticals. We have offered complete consulting and development services for Big Three Automotive and Fortune 500 Companies. Our complete consulting services include mobile roadmapping, user interface design mock-ups and product specification documents. To view our current portfolio of work visit http://futurehelpdesigns.com/portfolio/
